Rules.InvariantScript:
//これがSVGだ。Switch()関数を使用しているのは、そうしないとメニュー・アイテムがアクティブになったときにアイコンの色を動的に変更できないからだ。もしSVGを使うことに抵抗があるなら、IconsSVGorStandardをOffに切り替えて、標準のアイコンを使うことをお勧めする。

"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,"
&EncodeUrl("
    "& Switch(
        ThisItem.ID,
        
        //id of gallery item //
        1,
        //svg code
        "<svg
            version='1.1'
            id='Capa_1'
            xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
            xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'
            x='0px'
            y='0px'
	        viewBox='0 0 16 16'
            style='enable-background:new 0 0 39.434 39.434;'
	        xml:space='preserve'
        >
            <defs>  
                <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'> 
                    <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color: "& NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour &";'></stop>  
                    <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "& NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour2 &";'></stop>  
                </linearGradient>  
            </defs>  
            <g>
                <path
                    fill='"&If(
                        ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate = App.ActiveScreen,
                        "url(#gradient)",
                        "#6f6f6f"
                        )&"'
                    fill-rule='evenodd'
                    d='M2 13.5V7h1v6.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h9a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5V7h1v6.5a1.5 1.5 0 0 1-1.5 1.5h-9A1.5 1.5 0 0 1 2 13.5zm11-11V6l-2-2V2.5a.5.5 0 0 1 .5-.5h1a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5z'
                />
                <path
                    fill='"&If(
                        ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate = App.ActiveScreen,
                        "url(#gradient)",
                        "#6f6f6f"
                        )&"'
                    fill-rule='evenodd'
                    d='M7.293 1.5a1 1 0 0 1 1.414 0l6.647 6.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708L8 2.207 1.354 8.854a.5.5 0 1 1-.708-.708L7.293 1.5z'
                />
//アニメーションを担当するスニペット
            </g>",
    
        2,
        "<!-- Uploaded to SVGRepo https://www.svgrepo.com -->
        <svg
            version='1.2'
            baseProfile='tiny'
            id='Layer_1'
            xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
            xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'
	        x='0px'
            y='0px'
            viewBox='0 0 16 16'
            xml:space='preserve'
            fill='black'
        >

            <defs>
                <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                    <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color: "& NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour &";'></stop>  
                    <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "& NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour2 &";'></stop>  
                </linearGradient>  
            </defs> 
            <path
                fill='"&If(
                    ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate = App.ActiveScreen,
                    "url(#gradient)",
                    "#6f6f6f"
                )&"'
                d='M8 8a3 3 0 1 0 0-6 3 3 0 0 0 0 6zm2-3a2 2 0 1 1-4 0 2 2 0 0 1 4 0zm4 8c0 1-1 1-1 1H3s-1 0-1-1 1-4 6-4 6 3 6 4zm-1-.004c-.001-.246-.154-.986-.832-1.664C11.516 10.68 10.289 10 8 10c-2.29 0-3.516.68-4.168 1.332-.678.678-.83 1.418-.832 1.664h10z'
            />", 
        3,
        "<svg
            xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
            width='16'
            height='16'
            class='bi bi-wallet2'
            viewBox='0 0 16 16'
        >
            <defs>  
                <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>
                    <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color: "& NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour &";'></stop>  
                    <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "& NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour2 &";'></stop>  
                </linearGradient>  
            </defs> 
            <path
                fill='"&If(
                    ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate = App.ActiveScreen,
                    "url(#gradient)",
                    "#6f6f6f"
                )&"'
                d='M12.136.326A1.5 1.5 0 0 1 14 1.78V3h.5A1.5 1.5 0 0 1 16 4.5v9a1.5 1.5 0 0 1-1.5 1.5h-13A1.5 1.5 0 0 1 0 13.5v-9a1.5 1.5 0 0 1 1.432-1.499L12.136.326zM5.562 3H13V1.78a.5.5 0 0 0-.621-.484L5.562 3zM1.5 4a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v9a.5.5 0 0 0 .5.5h13a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5v-9a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5h-13z'
            />",

        4,
        "<svg
            version='1.1'
            id='Layer_1'
            xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
            xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'
            x='0px'
            y='0px'
	        viewBox='0 0 470 520'
            style='enable-background:new 0 0 458.317 458.317;'
            xml:space='preserve'
            fill='"&If(
                ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate = App.ActiveScreen,
                NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour,
                "#6f6f6f"
            )&"'
        >
            <defs>  
                <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                    <stop offset='0%' style='stop-color: "& NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour &";'></stop>  
                    <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "& NeonGlowNavMenu_vertical.SVGActiveIconColour2 &";'></stop>  
                </linearGradient>  
            </defs> 
            <g>
	            <g>
		        <path
                    fill='"&If(
                        ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate = App.ActiveScreen,
                        "url(#gradient)",
                        "#6f6f6f"
                    )&"'
                    d='M446.185,179.159h-64.768c-2.536-7.702-5.636-15.15-9.26-22.29l45.818-45.818c4.737-4.737,4.737-12.416,0-17.152 L364.416,40.34c-4.737-4.737-12.416-4.737-17.152,0l-45.818,45.818c-7.14-3.624-14.587-6.724-22.289-9.26V12.131 c0.001-6.699-5.429-12.129-12.128-12.129h-75.743c-6.698,0-12.129,5.43-12.129,12.128v64.768 c-7.702,2.535-15.149,5.636-22.29,9.26L111.05,40.341c-4.737-4.737-12.416-4.737-17.152,0L40.339,93.9 c-4.737,4.736-4.737,12.416,0,17.152l45.817,45.817c-3.624,7.14-6.725,14.588-9.26,22.29H12.129C5.43,179.159,0,184.59,0,191.288 v75.743c0,6.698,5.43,12.128,12.129,12.128h64.768c2.536,7.702,5.636,15.149,9.26,22.29L40.34,347.266 c-4.737,4.736-4.737,12.416,0,17.152l53.559,53.559c4.737,4.736,12.416,4.736,17.152,0l45.817-45.817 c7.14,3.624,14.587,6.725,22.29,9.26v64.768c0,6.698,5.43,12.128,12.129,12.128h75.743c6.698,0,12.129-5.43,12.129-12.128v-64.768 c7.702-2.535,15.149-5.636,22.289-9.26l45.818,45.817c4.737,4.736,12.416,4.736,17.152,0l53.559-53.559 c4.737-4.737,4.737-12.416,0-17.152l-45.817-45.817c3.624-7.14,6.724-14.587,9.26-22.289h64.768 c6.698,0,12.129-5.43,12.129-12.128v-75.743C458.314,184.59,452.884,179.159,446.185,179.159z M229.157,289.542 c-33.349,0-60.384-27.035-60.384-60.384s27.035-60.384,60.384-60.384s60.384,27.035,60.384,60.384 S262.506,289.542,229.157,289.542z'
                /> 
	            </g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
            <g>
            </g>
    ")&"  
        </svg>"
)

CustomProperties.Name: MenuItems
CustomProperties.Tooltip: アイコン、その他に関する値をテーブル型で指定します

CustomProperties.DisplayName: カスタムSVGまたは標準アイコン -IconsSVGorStandard-
CustomProperties.Name: IconsSVGorStandard
CustomProperties.Tooltip: オン→カスタムSVG , オフ→標準アイコン

CustomProperties.Name: DarkMode
CustomProperties.Tooltip: ダークモードを有効にします

CustomProperties.DisplayName: アクティブカスタムSVG色1 -SVGActiveIconColour-
CustomProperties.Name: SVGActiveIconColour
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 1番目のカスタムSVGのアイコン色を指定します

CustomProperties.DisplayName: アクティブカスタムSVG色2 -SVGActiveIconColour2-
CustomProperties.Name: SVGActiveIconColour2
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 2番目のカスタムSVGのアイコン色を指定します

CustomProperties.Name: StandardIconColour
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 標準アイコンの色を指定します

CustomProperties.Name: inversion
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 左右反転します。true→左向け , false→右向け
